preset.prompt:
Ultra-detailed photorealistic portrait of Kelly, neutral expression, 
front view, studio key light at 45 degrees with soft fill, accurate skin tones, 
clean background, no jewelry, hair neat and natural. Maintain identity strictly.
preset.negative_prompt:
artifacts, extra teeth, strange eyes, asymmetry, blur, glints on skin, lens distortion,
makeup heavy, fantasy, cartoon, oversharpening
